channel.title: How Do I Get A HP Level To Heal You?
channel.description:
I'm using Project 16 v.6 as my server source, but I have got a problem which I would like to fix.
What code do I need to add and where to make it automatically heal you when you get a HP level.
Thanks, if you can't help no problem, but i'll like it if anybody can help.

item.title: How Do I Get A HP Level To Heal You?
item.dc:creator: @Mopara Mopara
item.description:
@Mopara wrote:

Still, back to the question, please :rolleyes:[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 03:45:09 PM[/size][hr]Well, i’m going to sleep now, i’ll add this to my favourites, and if I don’t see a reply by GMT time tomorrow morning, i’m going crazy… :eek: :mad: ;D[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 03:59:29 PM[/size][hr]Come on people, I really need some help.

Read full topic
